direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle one-time transactions but perform different operations (submission vs. status check).
Both methods involve transaction processing with similar parameter handling and request structures.
Both methods access transaction history data, though for different types of transactions.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized for sending signed requests.
The status check must follow the submission of a one-time transaction.
Both methods involve verifying transaction statuses and handling similar exceptions.
